title: Consignment event
description: An event which occurred during the processing of the referenced consignment

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

data.title: Data bytes
data.description: The submitted data as base64 string, be aware large files > 100KByte should be submitted as fileReference

EdiDataProcessing.title: Data processing
EdiDataProcessing.description: Events occurred while validating and processing the data

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiDataProcessingExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiDataProcessingExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing the data.Use (null) to report successful processing of the data

EdiDeliveryAttemptDifficulties.title: Difficulties
EdiDeliveryAttemptDifficulties.description: There were difficulties delivering the goods

EdiDeliveryAttemptFailedExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiDeliveryAttemptFailedExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that caused the delivery to be fail

EdiDeliveryAttemptRejected.title: Rejected
EdiDeliveryAttemptRejected.description: The consignee has rejected the consignment

EdiDeliveryPlanning.title: Delivery planning
EdiDeliveryPlanning.description: Events occurred while planning the delivery of the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiDeliveryPlanningExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiDeliveryPlanningExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while planning the delivery of the consignment.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

EdiDeliveryStartedExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while starting the delivery of the consignment.Use (null) to report successful starting of the consignment delivery

EdiDeliverySuccessfulExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiDeliverySuccessfulExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred when consignment was successfully delivered.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

EdiDocumentItem.title: Document
EdiDocumentItem.description: All kind of documents used for transports

documentDateTime.title: Document item creation date and time
documentDateTime.description: The date and time this document item was created

EdiDocumentReferences.title: References
EdiDocumentReferences.description: All references to the linked documents, systems and devices

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique id of the document

consignmentObjectId.title: Unique central consignment number
consignmentObjectId.description: Unique identification for the consignment in a central system

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

consignmentNoReceivingPartner.title: Consignment number of the receiving partner
consignmentNoReceivingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the receiving partner

tourId.title: Tour Id
tourId.description: A unique identifier assigned to the tour by the devlivering company

stopId.title: Stop Id
stopId.description: Unique identifier for the stop within the tour

vehicleId.title: The vehicle id
vehicleId.description: The unique Id of the vehicle (Truck/Trailer/Train)

deviceId.title: Device Id
deviceId.description: The id of the used device

systemReferences.title: A reference to an IT system
systemReferences.description: A reference to an IT system like TMS, etc.

packageNo.title: Package number / Barcode of the package
packageNo.description: Unique identification for the package. This is often an SSCC / NVE barcode number

commissionNo.title: Commission Number
commissionNo.description: Commission number under which the commission is managed in the master data

EdiEmptyExtendableObject.title: Empty Extendable Object
EdiEmptyExtendableObject.description: The empty EmptyExtendableObject is used for non yet completed defined objects.

EdiEventArrivalAtReceiver.title: Arrival at receiver
EdiEventArrivalAtReceiver.description: Events occurred while arriving the receiver

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiEventCancellation.title: EdiEventCancellation
EdiEventCancellation.description: Events indicating the cancellation of the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiEventChangeRequest.title: Change request
EdiEventChangeRequest.description: A new delivery term that should be considered for billing

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiEventCompletion.title: Work completed - forwarded
EdiEventCompletion.description: Events indicating successful completion of a task, consignment has been forwarded

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

signee.title: Signee
signee.description: Name of the person which rejected the consignment

EdiEventDeliveryAttemptFailed.title: Delivery attempt failed
EdiEventDeliveryAttemptFailed.description: Events indicating a failed delivery attempt

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

returnConsignmentNo.title: Return consignment no
returnConsignmentNo.description: Number of the consignment which is used to return the goods to the shipper

signee.title: Signee
signee.description: Name of the person which rejected the consignment

EdiEventDeliveryStarted.title: Delivery started
EdiEventDeliveryStarted.description: Events indicating the start of the delivery

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

tourNumber.title: Tour number
tourNumber.description: Number of the planned / assigned local traffic tour for delivery

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

signee.title: Signee
signee.description: Name of the person which accepted the consignment

EdiEventEstimatedArrivalAtReceiver.title: Estimated time of arrival at receiver
EdiEventEstimatedArrivalAtReceiver.description: Events occurred regarding the estimated time of arrival at receiver

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

estimatedArrivalTime.title: Estimated arrival date/time
estimatedArrivalTime.description: Date and time of the estimated arrival

EdiEventGateway.title: Cross dock
EdiEventGateway.description: Events occurred while cross docking the consignment. (i.e. HUB or gateway cross dock)

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

loaded.title: The consignment has been loaded
loaded.description: The consignment has been loaded onto the truck leaving the gateway

unloaded.title: The consignment has been unloaded
unloaded.description: The consignment has been unloaded from the truck delivering the consignment to the gateway

EdiEventNotification.title: Notification
EdiEventNotification.description: Events occurred while processing the notification of the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiFileContent.title: File Content
EdiFileContent.description: Transfers file data like a picture, pdf, txt..

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: The content type like application/pdf, image/png...

EdiFileReference.title: File Reference
EdiFileReference.description: Reference to a file in an online storage

absoluteUri.title: Absolute Uri
absoluteUri.description: An absolute URL to a file on the online storage

uriValidFrom.title: Uri Valid From
uriValidFrom.description: The URL is valid from date

uriValidTo.title: Uri Valid To
uriValidTo.description: The URL is valid until date

EdiGatewayExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiGatewayExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the consignment.Use (null) to report successful cross dock of the consignment

EdiGeneralProcessingNotification.title: General processing
EdiGeneralProcessingNotification.description: Events occurred while physically processing the pickup order (e.g. moving goods, scanning packages)

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiGeoPosition.title: Geo position
EdiGeoPosition.description: Data about the current geo position

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: North–south position of a point on the Earth's surface

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: East–west position of a point on the Earth's surface

placeName.title: Place name
placeName.description: The place name of the current geo position

w3WCoordinate.title: What3words coordinate
w3WCoordinate.description: A coordinate for the What3Words service like index.home.raft

recordTime.title: Record time
recordTime.description: Time the GPS record was created

angle.title: Angle
angle.description: The angle is the direction that the vehicle is moving in (Heading)

EdiGeoRadius.title: GeoRadius for the accuracy
EdiGeoRadius.description: GeoRadius that describes when a Position is considered as in range

radius.title: GeoRadius for the Coordinates
radius.description: GeoRadius that extends the range of the coordinates

radiusMeasurementUnitCode.title: Unit Code for GeoRadius
radiusMeasurementUnitCode.description: Code that describes the unit in which the radius is measured. Default kilometers (KMT)

EdiGeoSpeed.title: Speed
EdiGeoSpeed.description: The current speed of the vehicle

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: The current speed of the vehicle

speedMeasurementUnitCode.title: Unit Code for Speed
speedMeasurementUnitCode.description: Code that describes the unit in which the Speed is measured. Default kilometers (KMT)

EdiMessageRouting.title: Routing information of the message
EdiMessageRouting.description: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer

partnerId.title: The PartnerId
partnerId.description: The partner which is sending the message to the receiving partner for further actions (e.g. 1234)

ediId.title: The Edi Id
ediId.description: The Edi Id is the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

coniziId.title: The Conizi Id
coniziId.description: The conizi id for internal routing purposes

EdiNetwork.title: Network
EdiNetwork.description: The network under which rules the consignment should be processed

networkId.title: Name of the network
networkId.description: The name of the network. This is often identical to the name of the code list. Since the same code list may however be used outside the network, this field independently allows to specify the network

codelist.title: Name of the code list used
codelist.description: The name of the code list which specifies how the receiving system should interpret the codes used

product.title: Name of the product
product.description: The product allows to distinguish different processes within one network, effectively sub classing the network

EdiNotificationEventExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiNotificationEventExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the consignment/pickup.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment/pickup

EdiNotificationExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiNotificationExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the notification of the consignment.Use (null) to report successful notifcations of the consignment

EdiPartnerIdentification.title: Fields to identify the partner
EdiPartnerIdentification.description: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

partnerId.title: The PartnerId
partnerId.description: The partner which is sending the message to the receiving partner for further actions (e.g. 1234)

ediId.title: The Edi Id
ediId.description: The Edi Id is the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

coniziId.title: The Conizi Id
coniziId.description: The conizi id for internal routing purposes

EdiSignature.title: Signature
EdiSignature.description: The signature of the recipient/person of interest

signatureDateTime.title: Signature date and time
signatureDateTime.description: The date and time of signature

EdiSigningInformation.title: Signing Information
EdiSigningInformation.description: Transmission of the receipt, the delivery date and the delivery time

EdiStatusImage.title: Status image
EdiStatusImage.description: All kind of status images, used for documentation

imageDateTime.title: Document item creation date and time
imageDateTime.description: The date and time this status image was created

EdiTimeSlotConsignee.title: Time slot from consignee
EdiTimeSlotConsignee.description: The consignee has provided a time slot for delivery

newDeliveryDate.title: New delivery date / time
newDeliveryDate.description: The new date / time when the delivery will be performed

EdiTrigger.title: Trigger
EdiTrigger.description: Event that is a trigger for starting a notification

EdiUnloading.title: Unloading
EdiUnloading.description: Events occurred while unloading the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

EdiUnloadingExceptions.title: Exceptions
EdiUnloadingExceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the consignment.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

consignmentNoReceivingPartner.title: Consignment number of the receiving partner
consignmentNoReceivingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the receiving partner

consignmentNoDeliveringPartner.title: Consignment number of the delivering partner
consignmentNoDeliveringPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the delivering partner

consignmentObjectId.title: Unique central consignment number
consignmentObjectId.description: Unique identification for the consignment in a central system
